well, i suppose i could answer a FEW more questions :D.

disagreeable he isn't, because most of the time he's trying to get in 
your (general you) trust, and he's basically a nice guy.

the magicification, if you can work it in and think it'll sound good, 
sure! all the way!

oh, and i figure he wouldn't trust the thief guy, because he's a 
thief, you know? thieves aren't the most trusty fellers. the mage 
sounds a little shifty too, if you want that to work with. if 
anyone's ever seen the movie Soldier, the captain guy (the one who 
gets shot by the Colonel) basically sums up his approach to life.

Oldschool
